1558748943_1it9RV9vuxwM3fEdT6B9k5sGjn91k.body: i've had the same problem and was able to solve it after reducing my content to a little bit less than 10 MB and modyfing the main index.html before publishing...

Downloading more than 10 MB requires user interaction and that's a good thing. It protects the visitor from accidentally downloading a huge site. Someone could create a 1TB zite and flood your hard drive with garbage.

> [boobaloo](#comment_6_1it9RV9vuxwM3fEdT6B9k5sGjn91kMkYp): Well, what do you know? At least how to sign and publish a site that is larger than 10MB but other than that: nothing :)
